DOC.brief_summary: This research trial studies biomarkers in tumor tissue samples from younger patients with rhabdomyosarcoma. Studying samples of tumor tissue from patients with cancer in the laboratory may help doctors learn more about changes that occur in DNA and identify biomarkers related to cancer
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers in Tumor Tissue Samples From Younger Patients With Rhabdomyosarcoma
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES: I. To demonstrate CRKL expression at the protein level in rhabdomyosarcoma tumors by tissue microarray (TMA). OUTLINE: Archived tumor tissue samples are analyzed for CRKL expression.
DOC.criteria: Alveolar rhabdomyosarcoma and embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma specimens from the Children Oncology Group (COG) tumor microarrays (TMAs)
